structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

text.section: The need for the proposed withdrawal;
The reasons for the withdrawal and the use of the water to be withdrawn;
A description of the water source from which the withdrawal is proposed;
The volume, frequency and rate of water the applicant proposes to withdraw;
The length of time for which the permit is sought;

The effect of the proposed withdrawal on public drinking water supplies, water quality, wastewater treatment, waste assimilation, groundwater recharge areas, navigation, hydropower resources, water-based recreation, wetland habitats, fish and wildlife, agriculture, and flood plains;
The alternatives, if any, to the proposed withdrawal including a study of cost factors, feasibility and environmental effects of such alternatives; and
Conservation measures instituted, or to be instituted, by the applicant.
